alert.note: Alert for North Sioux; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 6:49PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Sioux and eastern Goshen Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 549 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Agate Bed National Monument, or 23 miles north of Torrington, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Agate Bed National Monument. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
